alert.note: Alert for Lancaster; Northumberland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 02 at 7:01PM EDT until June 02 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM EDT FOR NORTHUMBERLAND...SOUTHEASTERN RICHMOND AND LANCASTER COUNTIES... At 700 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Saint Marys City to 6 miles east of Heathsville to near Lancaster, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. These severe storms will be near... Fair Port around 710 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Byrdton, Lottsburg, Regina, Mollusk, Senora, Avalon, Brook Vale, Nuttsville, Reedville and Belle Isle State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
